Class AppManager

java.lang.Object
AppManager
public class AppManager
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AppManager()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void addAudioContent()
    Method to add songs or podcasts to the app.
    static void buySong()
    Method to buy songs.
    static void consumerClientList()
    Method to display all registered consumers with their numerical ID
    static void createPlaylist()
    Method to create playlists.
    static void displayDataReport()
    Method to display some statistics of the app: - Accumulated total of reproductions - Most listened genre of all the platform and of a random consumer user - Most listened category of all the platform and of a random consumer user - Top 5 artists and content creators - Top 10 songs and podcasts - Of each genre, the number of sales and the revenue of those sales - Best seller song
    static void editPlaylist()
    Method to edit playlist that offer three options: - Add audio - Move audio: Moves one audio to an specified position.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    Method to play songs and podcasts.
    static void playlistList​(int user)
    Method to display a list of a specific user playlists

    Method to display all registered producers with their numerical ID

    Method to register clients.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppManager

      public AppManager()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Parameters:
      args -

    • registerClient

      public static void registerClient()
      Method to register clients. Used to register both main types of clients: Consumers and Producers.

    • consumerClientList

      public static void consumerClientList()
      Method to display all registered consumers with their numerical ID

    • producerClientList

      public static void producerClientList()
      Method to display all registered producers with their numerical ID

    • playlistList

      public static void playlistList​(int user)
      Method to display a list of a specific user playlists
      Parameters:
      user - position of the specified user in the clients ArrayList

    • test

      public static void test()

    • addAudioContent

      public static void addAudioContent()
      Method to add songs or podcasts to the app. Uses two overloaded methods "addAudioContent" to register each type of audio.

    • createPlaylist

      public static void createPlaylist()
      Method to create playlists. Need user ID input to assign the playlist to that user.

    • editPlaylist

      public static void editPlaylist()
      Method to edit playlist that offer three options: - Add audio - Move audio: Moves one audio to an specified position. E.g. Swap audio in position 1 to 2 - Remove audio

    • sharePlaylist

      public static void sharePlaylist()
      Method to share playlists. Uses a 6x6 pseudo-randomly generated matrix of integer values to create a 16 digit code that depends on whether the playlist has only songs, podcasts or has both. (@see docs/code.jpg)

    • playAudio

      public static void playAudio()
      Method to play songs and podcasts. Will play ads to if the user playing an audio is a standard consumer.

    • buySong

      public static void buySong()
      Method to buy songs. Has some restrictions if the user is a standard consumer.

    • displayDataReport

      public static void displayDataReport()
      Method to display some statistics of the app: - Accumulated total of reproductions - Most listened genre of all the platform and of a random consumer user - Most listened category of all the platform and of a random consumer user - Top 5 artists and content creators - Top 10 songs and podcasts - Of each genre, the number of sales and the revenue of those sales - Best seller song
